name: CHOCOLATE MOUSSE
text: Rich and creamy chocolate mousse with a hint of vanilla.

name: CHEESECAKE
text: Smooth and creamy cheesecake with a graham cracker crust.

name: PIZZA
text: Classic margherita pizza with fresh basil and mozzarella.

name: FRIES
text: Crispy golden fries served with ketchup.

name: CHICKEN BIRYANI
text: Fragrant basmati rice cooked with tender chicken and spices.

name: MUTTON BIRYANI
text: Slow-cooked mutton biryani with aromatic spices and herbs.

name: GRILLED SALMON
text: Juicy grilled salmon fillet with a lemon herb marinade.

name: BBQ RIBS
text: Tender BBQ ribs glazed with a smoky sauce.
